Ayan, if pronounced [(A)fter] + [(YA)r(N)], is a Persian name that means “long night”, “inspiration”. Ayan Name Meanings in Urdu-Ayan name is for boys. This is a very stylish name, which is getting popular among Pakistani parents. The meaning Ayan is “Gift from ALLAH” as the meaning of name itself reflects blessing from GOD to parents. Pakistani Parents are so choosy when it comes to give name to their new born child. They always seek for stylish and unique names with good meanings.
